title: Welcome to Hosting!
subtitle: Congratulations! You've successfully completed your host setup and are ready to start welcoming guests.

features.listingsDesc: Add your properties and start accepting bookings
features.calendarDesc: Set availability and block dates as needed
features.messagingDesc: Chat with guests before and during their stay
features.insightsDesc: Track your earnings and booking performance

nextStepsDesc: Ready to start your hosting journey? You can add your first property or explore your new host dashboard.
